revised_title: A 17th-century Overview of Precious Stones and Pearls
tldr: This article from 1666 provides a detailed overview of various precious stones and pearls, including their origins, properties, and prices. The author discusses the locations where diamonds, rubies, emeralds, pearls, and corals are found, as well as their extraction methods. The text also describes the value of these gems and the rules for determining their worth. Additionally, the author explains the process of finding and extracting bezoar stones from animals.
